verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> there is no <S%G3762>man<s%> that <S%G4160>doeth<s%> any <S%G5100>thing<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2927>secret<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G2212>seeketh<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> known <S%G1722>openly<s%> <S%G3954><s%>. <S%G1487>If<s%> thou <S%G4160>do<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>, <S%G5319>shew<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%> to the <S%G2889>world<s%>.
<S%G1161>When<s%> he had <S%G2036>said<s%> these <S%G5023>words<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, he <S%G3306>abode<s%> still <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G1112>murmuring<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: for <S%G3303>some<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%><S%G3754>,<s%> He <S%G2076>is<s%> a good <S%G18>man<s%>: <S%G1161>others<s%> <S%G243><s%> <S%G3004>said<s%>, <S%G3756>Nay<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> he <S%G4105>deceiveth<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%>.

<S%G1437>If<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%>, he shall <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> the <S%G1322>doctrine<s%>, <S%G4220>whether<s%> it <S%G2076>be<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> whether <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%>.

He that <S%G2980>speaketh<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G2212>seeketh<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> he that <S%G2212>seeketh<s%> his <S%G1391>glory<s%> that <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, the <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G227>true<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1325>Did<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> yet <S%G3762>none<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G4160>keepeth<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>? <S%G5101>Why<s%> go ye <S%G2212>about<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>?

<S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1223>therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>; <S%G3756>(not<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3962>fathers<s%>;) <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4059>ye<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%> <S%G4059>circumcise<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%>.

<S%G1487>If<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>, <S%G3363>that<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3089>should<s%> <S%G3363>not<s%> be <S%G3089>broken<s%>; are ye <S%G5520>angry<s%> at <S%G1698>me<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> I have <S%G4160>made<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> every <S%G3650>whit<s%> <S%G5199>whole<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%>? that: or, without breaking the law of Moses

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%> as he <S%G1321>taught<s%><S%G2532>,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Ye <S%G2504>both<s%> know <S%G1492>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> ye <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4159>whence<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G2064>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> he that <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G228>true<s%>, <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%><S%G3754>,<s%> <S%G3752>When<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2064>cometh<s%>, will he <S%G3385>do<s%> <S%G4160><s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G4592>miracles<s%> than <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> man hath <S%G4160>done<s%>?

The <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that the <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G1111>murmured<s%> such <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G5257>officers<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G4084>take<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2089>Yet<s%> a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G5550>while<s%> am <S%G1510>I<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> then I <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> him that <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%>, <S%G4226>Whither<s%> <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G3778>he<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2147>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>? <S%G3361>will<s%> <S%G3195><s%> he <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G1290>dispersed<s%> among the <S%G1672>Gentiles<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>teach<s%> the <S%G1672>Gentiles<s%>? Gentiles: or, Greeks

<S%G5101>What<s%> manner of <S%G3056>saying<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%>, Ye shall <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> me: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%>, thither <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G2064>come<s%>?

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G1722>In<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>, that <S%G3173>great<s%> day of the <S%G1859>feast<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G1437>If<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1372>thirst<s%>, let him <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%>.

He that <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> hath <S%G2036>said<s%>, out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2836>belly<s%> shall <S%G4482>flow<s%> <S%G4215>rivers<s%> of <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%>.

<S%G1161>(But<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> spake <S%G2036>he<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> they that <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> not <S%G3768>yet<s%> given; <S%G3754>because<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1392>was<s%> not <S%G3764>yet<s%> <S%G1392>glorified<s%>.)

<S%G4183>Many<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, when they <S%G191>heard<s%> this <S%G3056>saying<s%>, <S%G3004>said<s%>, Of a <S%G230>truth<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4396>Prophet<s%>.

Hath <S%G3780>not<s%> the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G3754>That<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4690>seed<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G2968>town<s%> of <S%G965>Bethlehem<s%>, <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%>?

<S%G3530>Nicodemus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, (he that <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G846>Jesus<s%> <S%G4314>by<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%>, <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>,) to Jesus: Gr. to him
